diagnosis.final_diagnosis: malignant peripheral nerve sheath tumor of the trachea
differential_diagnosis: metastasis (breast cancer, renal cell carcinoma, colon carcinoma, melanoma)
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis was supported by imaging findings of a lobulated solid mass causing near-total occlusion of the distal trachea, bronchoscopic findings of an exophytic mass, and histopathological examination revealing malignant features consistent with a low-grade variant of a malignant peripheral nerve sheath tumor (MPNST).
